ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:06:44 [Issue ID 4000-12738] urn:comicvine:4000-12738 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-20 21:09:28. [Issue ID 12738]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jennifer Kale is an amateur witch, a young woman still unfamiliar with her ties to the occult. What bond will be forged between Jennifer and Man-Thing? And when Jennifer accidentally unleashes the Nether-Spawn, will help come all too late?
Night of the Nether-Spawn! - two young people release a horror in the swamp and Man-Thing must intervene. The Spider Waits (reprint) - a man with a hatred of spiders is about to find that spiders hate him too Beginning with this issue Steve Gerber starts his run on Man-Thing.
ComicInfo.Title: The Haunter of the Swamp!
